item.description:
GenerationDesi Celebrates Diwali the Festival of Lights at Caprice Boston.

Friday November 21st from 10PM - 2 AM.

 

Plenty of Parking right accross and T accessible.
The Happy Days of Diwali are Here.

Lets make this Festival Special.

Cover only $10 if you email or RSVP.
Guestlist will close soon due to high demand. Others are charging a lot more.

The Shahensha of Desi Music is flying from NYC just for Diwali to play Desi Music. Bollywood , Bhangra Remixes.

Featuring Dj Jay, Bailu, Neal & Abhishek. Boston & NYC's Top Dj's.

Mark the date: Friday October 21st 2011.

Where: Caprice Boston (275 Tremont Street, Boston)

Everyone reduced until Midnight with RSVP. $15 without RSVP. $10 with RSVP.

RSVP for yourseld and your friends by emailing: Generationdesi@gmail.com

Doors at 10:00 PM.
21+ Event
Dress Code: Dress to Impress. (No Sneakers/ Hats/ Tims or Baggy Clothing)

Diwali Haiiiiiiii. Happy Diwali to ALL.

Come hang out and invite friends and family.

Admission: $10 after on the Guestlist until Midnight.
item.name: Annual Diwali Dhol Dhamaka (Downtown Boston) $10
